name: Point Of Light
description:
Point Of Light

A new game was created to impress people and give them something new !



The colors are chosen carefully to immerse player in the atmosphere of the game. 



Avoid the figures and reach the highest score, with the points you can buy not only the skins but also new figures for developing your skills. 

And stay concentrated ! The game does not spare anyone !


The game is already publised on Google Play,  but keep in mind that PC version is on a different level !
